title: Uruk Pursuer (4C190)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion • Uruk-Hai
Strength:	5
Vitality:	3
Site:	5
Game Text:	Tracker. Fierce. Unbound Hobbits may not be discarded. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is killed, exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player wound an unbound companion.
Lore:	”'None of that! Hold your tongues.'”
Rarity:	C
